channel.title: Airport Safety Feed
channel.description: Feed simulato per test di eventi critici aeroportuali

item.title: Runway incursion at Milan Linate
item.description: A ground vehicle entered the active runway without clearance.

item.title: Unauthorized drone activity near Malpensa
item.description: Drone sighted within restricted airspace, operations temporarily halted.

item.title: Bomb threat causes evacuation at JFK Airport terminal
item.description: A suspicious package was found in a maintenance area, prompting a bomb threat alert and temporary evacuation of Terminal 4. No injuries reported.

item.title: Bomb threat causes evacuation at London Airport terminal
item.description: A suspicious package was found in a maintenance area, prompting a bomb threat alert and temporary evacuation of Terminal 9. No injuries reported.

item.title: Bomb threat causes evacuation at Milan Airport terminal
item.description: A suspicious package was found in a maintenance area, prompting a bomb threat alert and temporary evacuation of Terminal 6. No injuries reported.
